sn47.19:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sumbhesu vihārati sedakaṁ nāma sumbhānaṁ nigamo. Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn47.19:2: "So tattha ñāyo"ti bhagavā etadavoca, "yathā medakathālikā antevāsī acariyaṁ avoca. Attānaṁ, bhikkhave, rakkhissāmīti satipaṭṭhānaṁ sevitabbaṁ; paraṁ rakkhissāmīti satipaṭṭhānaṁ sevitabbaṁ. Attānaṁ, bhikkhave, rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhati, paraṁ rakkhanto attānaṁ rakkhati.
sn47.19:3: Kathañca, bhikkhave, attānaṁ rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhati? Āsevanāya, bhāvanāya, bahulīkammena – evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, attānaṁ rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhati.
